thread.title: Trump Made Right Call on Iran Nuclear Deal

author: wsjcom
title: Trump Made Right Call on Iran Nuclear Deal
text: Regarding your editorial “After Obama’s Iran Deal” (May 9): Lost in the current Iran deal debate is the manner in which the agreement was entered into. Although clearly a treaty, President Obama and his Democratic accomplices flipped the constitutional requirement for approval by two-thirds of the Senate on its head, instead requiring 60 votes to block the agreement. This was one of a number of actions revealing President Obama’s disdain for the separation of powers and constitutional government. Usurping Congress’s authority over immigration with DACA was another glaring example. Elections do have consequences, but they...
